Package com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.operators

Class DecimalScaleSetter

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.streams.operator.AbstractOperator
com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.operators.DecimalScaleSetter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Operator
@PrimitiveOperator(comment=" Licensed Materials - Property of IBM (C) Copyright Teracloud ApS 2024, 2024, IBM Corp. 2010, 2016 All Rights Reserved. US Government Users Restricted Rights - Use, duplication or disclosure restricted by GSA ADP Schedule Contract with IBM Corp. ") @InputPortSet(cardinality=1) @OutputPortSet(cardinality=1, windowPunctuationOutputMode=Preserving) public class DecimalScaleSetter extends AbstractOperator
Set a decimal attribute's scale. Each input tuple results in an output tuple that includes all matching attributes and the modified decimal attribute. Example of a functor style operator that directly extends AbstractOperator.

The operator supports two parameters:

  • name Name of the attribute to be modified.
  • scale Scale for modified attribute.

The output tuple's value for attribute name is a result of:
  1. Obtaining a BigDecimal from the input tuple attribute with the same name.
  2. Setting the scale of the value with RoundingMode.DOWN.
  3. Assigning the modified value to the output tuple's attribute which may truncate the value according to its defined type: DECIMAL32, DECIMAL64 or DECIMAL128.

    • process

      public void process(StreamingInput<Tuple> port, Tuple tuple) throws Exception
